name: Poof's Killergarten Divided Fate
description:
Download game at: https://nevrycards.com/

Poof's Killergarten Divided Fate is Mega DLC for Binded Fate and is entirely for free. Adds new rooms, floors, quests, enemies, skills. characters, bosses, mechanics and more.

Poof's Killergarten Divided Fate is in difference to it's origin game "Poof's Killergarten", a roguelike game. Which takes place after one of the events from the previous entry. Avoid enemies and take them down, collect both pick up and inventory items and increase character stats to defeat strong bosses and pass to various floors. Unlock new challenges and playable characters in order to experience mysterious endings explaining important details.
